New Records: Aaron Judge hit his major league-leading 55th homer of the season
Luís Gil won his third straight decision, allowing four runs, five hits and three walks in 5 1/3 innings
Key Match Events: Judge, Torres, and Domínguez went deep
Domínguez tied the score at 2-2 with a two-run drive in the second
Judge followed in the third with a solo shot
Torres hit a solo shot to lead off the fifth
Chisholm Jr. had a sacrifice fly later in the inning for a 5-2 lead
Pre-Game Insights: Already assured of a playoff berth, the Yankees (92-64) can clinch the division with one victory over second-place Baltimore (86-70) during a three-game series in the Bronx that starts Tuesday night
New York opened a two-game lead over Cleveland for homefield advantage throughout the AL playoffs
Post-Match Reflections: Judge said he was sad that the A’s are leaving Oakland, reminiscing on memories as both a player and a kid when he made a few trips to the Coliseum
There’s a lot of history in this building

You can go back to the '70s, what they were able to do here three years in a row. A lot of special players played here, and just getting a chance to be on that same field and do some things — it’s definitely something I won’t forget

Judge already holds the AL single-season home run record he set with 62 in 2022 and moved ahead of Babe Ruth (1920, 1928), Mickey Mantle (1961) and Alex Rodriguez (2007) for fifth-most in franchise history
Judge has given the Yankees a lead with a home run 23 times this season
Domínguez tied the score at 2-2 with a two-run drive in the second
Judge followed in the third with a solo shot
Torres hit a solo shot to lead off the fifth
Chisholm Jr. had a sacrifice fly later in the inning for a 5-2 lead
Gil said he was “extremely happy and satisfied” to reach 15 wins as a rookie and thankful for the run support on Sunday
Even if the opposing team scores a thousand runs, I want to keep giving my team a shot
Because I know that those guys are going to be able to come back and score
Miscellaneous Highlights: Judge received a rousing ovation from the large contingent of Yankees fans in attendance when he ran out to center field before the game and again when he rounded the bases after his solo shot to center in the third
The A’s, who will play in Sacramento next season ahead of a planned move to Las Vegas in 2028, have one more series left at the Coliseum against the Texas Rangers beginning on Tuesday
Boone gave the game ball to Judge, who reached base four times and scored two runs
Others: Giancarlo Stanton doubled in a run in the seventh after Oakland closed to 5-4
Lawrence Butler went 0 for 5, ending his league-leading streak of reaching base safely at 27 straight games
Athletics: RHP Brandon Bielak was designated for assignment and RHP Joe Boyle was recalled from Triple-A Las Vegas
Yankees: RHP Jake Cousins (right pec strain) was placed on the 15-day injured list
Athletics: RHP Ross Stripling (lower back strain) threw a 30-pitch bullpen session. He is expected to face live hitters on Tuesday and could be activated ahead of the final weekend of the season
